segments.text: I was wondering if this is where the Resume Writing Workshop is being held .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are in the right place . Please come on in !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s been a long time since I ’ Ve had to look for work and put a resume together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s going to come together just fine . Trust me !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We start at the top with our name and contact information . Make sure the information is current .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Put your job experience first , if that is more impressive than your education .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about listing my interests and affiliations next ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that would make a good ending for your resume .
segments.speaker: S2
